h1. Desktop Buckets Settings

{{html:
<hr>
<form class="form-horizontal" ng-app="myApp" ng-controller="EditDesktopBucketSettingsController">
<fieldset>
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label" for="textinput">Domain</label>
        <div class="controls">
            <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" class="input-xlarge" ng-model="settings.domain">
        </div>
    </div>
    <hr>    
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label" for="appendedtext">Choose Private Storage Drive Size</label>
        <div class="controls">
            <div class="input-append">
                <input id="appendedtext" name="appendedtext" class="input-mini" placeholder="2" type="number" ng-model="settings.storage">    
                <span class="add-on">GB</span>
            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <hr>    
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label" for="checkboxes">Choose Hosting Location</label>
        <div class="controls">
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="settings.locations[0]" btn-checkbox>Ghent, Belgium</button>
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="settings.locations[1]" btn-checkbox>Bruges, Belgium</button>
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="settings.locations[2]" btn-checkbox>Lenoir, NC, USA</button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="form-actions">
        <button class="btn btn-info btn-large " ng-disabled="!isValid()" ng-click="save()">Save Desktop Buckets Settings</button>
    </div>
</fieldset>
</form>
<script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/DesktopBuckets/EditDesktopBucketSettingsController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="/$$space/.files/js/services/others.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

}}
